channel.title: How do i fix animation? (fix elastic look when die & attack)
channel.description:
im using dodian source if that will help
Ok, can someone explain how to fix elastic when npcs die

item.title: How do i fix animation? (fix elastic look when die & attack)
item.dc:creator: @JugglaScape JugglaScape
item.description:
@JugglaScape wrote:

ok im trying to fix Nechryael and the only thing i can find on him is:
} else if(npcs[i].npcType == 1613){
server.playerHandler.yell(“Nechryael has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-” + temp.combatLevel + “)”);
}
MonsterDropItems(npcs[i].npcType, npcs[i]);
temp.attackedNpc = false;
temp.attackedNpcId = -1;
}
npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true;

What one of thous do i change and what do you suggest i change it to?

Read full topic

item.source: How do i fix animation? (fix elastic look when die & attack)

item.title: How do i fix animation? (fix elastic look when die & attack)
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

  1. Elastic? I believe you mean animation? And it does that because in NPCHandler, the dying emotes are not set for each NPC. The bulk of them are given the man dying emote, hence the “elastic” animation when they die.

  2. Did you restart the server?

  3. Search “Varrock” a few times, it’ll take you there eventually.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i fix animation? (fix elastic look when die & attack)
